# Dotty. Pop-Art Webshop

> Norwegian pop-art e-commerce store selling original paintings and limited edition prints.

## About

Dotty. is an independent art brand based in Norway, creating bold pop-art inspired by classic pop-art and modern pop culture. The webshop sells:

- **Original paintings**: One-of-a-kind acrylic artworks on canvas
- **Limited prints**: High-quality reproductions in limited quantities

The target audience is creative individuals who want unique, colorful art that brings personality and joy to their homes.

## Site Structure

- `/` or `/no` - Norwegian homepage (default language)
- `/en` - English homepage
- `/no/shop` or `/en/shop` - Product catalog with filtering by collection
- `/no/shop/[slug]` - Individual product pages
- `/no/about` or `/en/about` - About the artist
- `/no/faq` - Frequently asked questions
- `/no/privacy` - Privacy policy
- `/no/terms` - Terms and conditions

## Products

Products are categorized as:
- `original` - Unique paintings (typically higher price, quantity of 1)
- `print` - Limited edition prints (lower price, limited stock)

Each product has:
- Title and description
- Price in NOK (Norwegian Kroner)
- Size dimensions (width x height in cm)
- Stock quantity
- Collection assignment
- High-resolution images

## Collections

Products are organized into thematic collections that can be filtered in the shop.

## Checkout

- Currency: NOK (Norwegian Kroner)
- Payment: Stripe (credit card)
- Shipping: Free shipping within Norway
- Languages: Norwegian (default), English

## Contact

## Technical

- Framework: Next.js 16 (App Router)
- Database: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- Payments: Stripe
- Hosting: Vercel
